content: StashAway Robo-Advisors Investments General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Jun 2019Do I need to include the hyphen between the bank account number when adding my bank account for withdrawal at StashAway.If I were to withdraw at Stashaway, do I need to include a hyphen between my bank account number? Thanks and appreciate any responses4 answersAnswerBump0

Siow NanLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Yes, not needed. I can add with or without the hyphen. It should not really matter imo0 comments1
